participant_2.background:
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I spent my last birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do?
My favorite thing to do is create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love making movies, it's a really creative outlet.
I've always wanted to make a movie, but I don't know where to start.
There are a lot of resources out there to help you learn how to make movies. You can find tutorials online, or you can take classes.
I'll have to look into that. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! What kind of movies do you like to make?
I like to make short films that are funny or heartwarming.
Those sound great! I'm sure you'll make some amazing movies.
What are some of your favorite movies?
I love a lot of different movies, but some of my favorites include The Princess Bride, Casablanca, and The Shawshank Redemption.
Those are all great movies! I'm a big fan of The Princess Bride and The Shawshank Redemption.
Me too! They're both so well-made and have such great stories.
I agree. They're both classics for a reason.
